### Roles

Data manager for the Ocean Tracking Network (OTN), bringing researchers together into community and now bringing the Trackyverse to OTN contributors. Coordinating in-person and virtual events. Hosting the [OTN Study Hall](https://oceantrackingnetwork.org/study-hall/) where developers can meet with the community. Spreading the word about building better software together! Co-developing [glatos](https://github.com/ocean-tracking-network/glatos/) with Chris and [surimi](https://github.com/ocean-tracking-network/surimi/) with Bruce.
